body:
@adamjstewart - maybe you could approve this?
    
- The testsuite of 2.4.6 and newer needs autoconf >= 2.62
- The tests use automake, add it if building with --test
- If Fortran compilers are not present, skip the tests which use them.
title: libtool-testsuite: Add test-dependencies and skip FC-tests if not present
